foundation half-double_crochet fhdc this is used for the first row of the headband replacing the traditional chain start - star stitch this stitch is used to create the centre of the headband this is a tricky stitch to get started but it makes a lovely textured finish - backwards joining method this is my new favourite way to change colours and also create the camel stitch effect - camel stitch this technique uses the third stitch of a single_crochet half_double_crochet or double_crochet this means looking for the loop behind the normal v stitch made when using a single_crochet ensure you crochet loosely so the loop isn t too tight to work into thank you for downloading this pattern the starlight headband is the newest addition to the emmeclaire range of crocheted accessories there s nothing quite like a snuggly headband to keep you warm in winter despite living in queensland australia where the sun seems to shine the majority of the year i embraced the crackling of wood on an open fire while sipping a warm coffee to create this pattern 2 before you begin before you start it is important to note the following details the headband is designed
